body:
I just received this warning from Spack:

```
  Spack will think this package is installed. Manually remove this
  directory to fix:
  /ddnA/project/eschnett/shelob/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-
  redhat6-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spack/julia-master-
  65fs5pr57mv6jfcj7cqvu3ipdw4n56uo
```

Instead of asking me to manually remove the prefix, Spack should mark the prefix directory as "incomplete" (e.g. via a file named `THIS IS NOT A COMPLETE INSTALL"), and should test for this file while checking whether the prefix is a valid install.
title: `--keep-prefix` should mark prefix as invalid
